root.name: Winter Games
root.description: OverviewWinter Games was developed by Epyx and features sports events featured in the Winter Olympic Games. It was first released in 1986 for the Commodore 64 and later for a multitude of other platforms.At the time the International Olympic Committee didn't license the Olympic games so the games doesn't contain any references to the 1984 Sarajevo Winter Olympics, or any Winter Olympics prior.EventsThe events featured in the games are a combination of the following:Alpine SkiingBiathlonBobsleighFigure SkatingFree SkatingHotdogLugeSki JumpingSpeed Skating

similar_games.game: Beijing 2008: The Official Video Game of the Olympic Games
